This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader. Alternatively you can view the HTML archives at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=HEABIO-ETHICS.
LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2014-10-19T20:29:50Z Chris Willmott 2014-10-19T22:29:03+01:00 2014-10-19T22:29:03+01:00 Research ethics scenarios https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEABIO-ETHICS;3ae12c20.1410 Hi folks<br><br>Following significant changes to our curriculum I have a series of sessions on research ethics to prepare including a tutorial. I'm on the scrounge for any tried and tested scenarios/case studies in the specific area of research ethics that I might be able to adapt for the latter. Do you have anything I could repurpose? [...] Lucy Avati 2014-04-07T00:09:53+00:00 2014-04-07T00:09:53+00:00 Job vacancy: Professor and Director of Bioethics at the University of Sydney https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEABIO-ETHICS;df4de1ba.1404 Dear all,<br><br>The University of Sydney School of Public Health, Sydney Medical School, is currently seeking a Professor of Bioethics and Director, Centre for Values, Ethics and the Law in Medicine. For more information and to apply, visit sydney.edu.au/recruitment<http://sydney.edu.au/recruitment/> and search by the reference number 2306/1013.<br><br>PROFESSOR OF BIOETHICS AND DIRECTOR OF THE CENTRE FOR VALUES, ETHICS AND THE LAW IN MEDICINE (VELiM)<http://sydney.nga.net.au/cp/index.cfm?event=jobs.checkJobDetailsNewApplication&returnToEvent=jobs.processJobSearch&jobid=ed1109fa-31b5-7ad1-2ee3-772aa783b413&CurATC=EXT&CurBID=949319bc-8898-4f11-ac4b-9db401358504&jobsListKey=0f59b886-f787-4c29-9cdb-9bef0a2><br>SCHOOL OF PUBLIC HEALTH / SYDNEY MEDICAL SCHOOL<br>REFERENCE NO. 2306/1013 [...]
